de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class PositiveIntegerFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.PositiveIntegerFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.String>

    public class PositiveIntegerFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener<java.lang.String>
    A filter to apply to text field objects as a ChangeListener. It prevents the input of non numeric characters and can limit the min and max value.

    • Field Summary

      Constructs a filter for the given text field and limits the input values.
